alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 9:25PM CST until January 03 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Blizzard conditions possible across the higher elevations above 4000 feet. * WHERE...Sevier Smoky Mountains, Cocke Smoky Mountains, Blount Smoky Mountains and Southeast Monroe Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Monroe
